title: 054 - Filipino Mega Bats
description: On today's show, the guys recap their weekend in Michigan for Pat's bachelor party, Connor walks the guys through how his identity was officially stolen in Rhode Island and the steps he needs to take to regain it, and the boys go through a new Folder of Death including some #PodFacts, what their favorite kinds of french fries are, the Filipino Mega Bats that are slowly taking over the Philippines that look like the creature from Jeepers Creepers, the state of Calypso, and much more. Don't forget to send your questions to @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram to get them on the show. Have a great day, and enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
